value.title: Elementary Robotics Raises $13 Million
value.excerpt: Elementary Robotics Inc., a downtown-based robotics startup, has raised $12.7 million in Series A funding. The raise announcement coincided with the launch of Elementary’s inspection and traceability robot for sale on the open market as of June 30.
